mappers.update: update ${com.seeyon.apps.kdXdtzXc.po.TravelExpenseXinCheng} set [机构编码]=?,[部门编码]=?,[机构编码OA]=?,[部门编码OA]=?,[更新日期]=SYSDATE where id=?
mappers.select: SELECT t.id as id, t.[机构编码] as jgbm, t.[部门编码] as bmbm, t.[机构编码OA] as jgbmoa, t.[部门编码OA] as bmbmoa, t.[同步日期] as insertTime, t.[更新日期] as updateTime FROM ${com.seeyon.apps.kdXdtzXc.po.TravelExpenseXinCheng} t where t.[机构编码]=? and t.[部门编码]=?
